body.name: Parsonver Smart Watch(Answer/Make Calls), 1.32" HD Fitness Watch for Men Women, 100+ Sport Modes IP68 Waterproof, Heart Rate Sleep Blood Oxygen Monitor, Fitness Activity Tracker for Android iOS Phones
features: 【MAKE/ANSWER CALL & SMART NOTIFICATION】 Connect your Parsonver smart watch to Bluetooth so you can answer calls without picking up the phone. Whether you're running, cycling, working, on the subway, at the gym, driving, etc., you can answer calls with a single tap. Stay in the loop with smart reminders for calls, SMS, texts, and App notifications (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, and more). Effortlessly read notifications with just a wrist lift! Instant reads, instant ease, all on your wrist!

【FITNESS TRACKER AND 100+ SPORTS MODES】This fitness watch offers 100 + indoor and outdoor sports modes in the "Fitomo" APP, including walking, running, cycling, skipping, basketball, football, and more, to meet the needs of most sports enthusiasts. During exercise, the pedometer watch automatically records daily steps, distance counter, calories burned, active minutes, etc., precisely gather and sync data to your mobile App for a detailed overview of your daily activities.

【YOUR 24-HOUR HEALTH COMPANION】This Smart Watch for Men & Women provides all-around health tracking, allowing you to accurately track 24-hour heart rate and blood oxygen. And also has sleep monitoring function (deep sleep, light sleep, awake time, REM sleep, sporadic naps), offering a comprehensive sleep quality analysis. Easily get total health management from your wrist and take another step towards your health. And the health watch also can intelligently monitor the current stress level, we always care about the health of every customer.

【DIY WATCH DIALS & MULTI-FUNCTIONS】This Activity fitness tracker watch not only allows you to change different built-in dials (There are more than 100 dial styles in the "Fitomo" app.), but also you can even design your own unique dial by setting your favorite photos as the background. In addition, there are many other useful functions in it, such as breathing training, women's health tracking, weather, music control, stopwatch, alarm clock, timer, camera control, brightness adjustment, sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder, finding the phone, raising to wake, etc. It is much more than a simple watch.

【ELEGANT AND ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT, EASY TO WEAR】This SPROD1 sport smart watch combines the concept of elegant and lightweight design. Weighing only around you a comfortable & free wearing experience. What's more, the step counter watch is equipped with a customized 1.32-inch circular HD display with a resolution of 360*360 pixel, creating an exquisite visual display that makes all incoming calls, messages and reminders extremely clear.

【LONG BATTERY LIFE & IP68 WATERPROOF】Daily use of the Smartwatch for Android and iPhone Phones is about 7-14 days, and the standby time can be up to 30 days, taking only 2 hours for charging. Even better, it’s compatible with Android 6.0/iOS 9.0 and above smartphones, leaving no one behind. Stay worry-free while wearing Parsonver SPROD1 smartwatch with its IP68 waterproof design, allowing you to embrace rain and sweat, also washing dishes without a second thought.

【24/7 AFTER-SALES SUPPORT】Parsonver prioritize our user experience, we have developed a very efficient and friendly after sales support, 24 hours a day. Any questions, queries or even suggestions, so we can improve are all encouraged and welcomed. We are willing to help people improve their lives with the use of fantastic technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like this better than my Fitbit.
reviews.reviewText: I chose this watch/tracker because I love the look of the Google watch (but very expensive) and it isn’t boxy looking like all the other trackers out there. Nice large round flat face (another plus for me), has everything I need as a tracker, battery life is longer than others and a very comfortable fit. Always get compliments as people think it is a Google watch and it looks expensive. Would definitely buy again, I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far so good! For the price it’s great for the few things I was looking for in a smart watch. Text messages go through, you can’t reply but it’s nice to get the notification and a quick look. Pretty accurate sleep tracker, my son wakes me up throughout the night and the awake times on the watch are spot on. Easy to use and looks sharp. Awesome battery’s life so far, I’ve had it almost a month and have charged it once. The alarm feature is great too, multiple alarms can be set with a 10 minute snooze and it vibrates so it’s a much gentler wake up. Very happy with it and can’t be mad at the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for cost
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these one for myself and other for my son. I wanted toy try a watch before spending money on an expensive and now not sure I will got on the experience one.I have only had for 2 weeks but like it so far. Need to learn more about call features but good product. Long battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent start smart watch
reviews.reviewText: This is my first smart watch, but I generally like it. It's large but relatively thin which is a must for me. It seems to do the basics very well. I mostly bought it to monitor my activity levels and sleep which it seems to do fine. I also am beginning to appreciate receiving calls and messages on my wrist without pulling the phone from my pocket. The battery goes several days without charging and it is easily and fairly quickly charged. The app to my smart phone is considered by my phone to be a high intensity app and does drain my battery a little more than normal. However, it knocks my battery life from 4 days to 3 days, so I am not too worried about this aspect. My main annoyance is with the band. It is a basic silicon band which is not uncomfortable, but I wouldn't list as being really comfortable. It just seems to slide around a little and hasn't gotten to where I don't think about having it on. So, I have ordered a different (cloth) band and hope that changes things. For the money, I am pleased with the purchase for a starter watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Paired well with iPhone 12. My 13 year old son loves it! Great watch for a kid or teenager that wants a smartwatch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for I guess
reviews.reviewText: I needed a quick fix to the problem of my samsung watch breaking, so I got this basic watch. Got it 3 months ago. There is nothing special about it, does the basics. I really just needed something to alert me when my phone was, and by who, was calling and texting since I cannot have my phone on me all day. It served it's purpose for about 2 months. Then the notifications for texts quit working and then calls shortly after. So needless to say it was just kept for time at this point. Then 2 days ago it quit working all together. Shut off and won't turn back on.So long story short you get what you pay for. And I bought a 55 watch. I didn't even get what I needed for more then a couple months but honestly what was I expecting.My advice, if you need a watch quick that does the basics in the interim of purchasing the one you want just go get a basic watch from Target or Walmart and save some money for what you actually want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have never owned a smart watch before, and so far works great! One of the coolest things is making a call and talking to the watch. Great features, step counter, heart rate monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars time of use of battery
reviews.reviewText: this watch works nice and is beautiful but you advertise charge lasts 7 to 10 days and I barely get three days with a charge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great for me as I have things wrong with me. And the apps on the watch are great and useful. Quite easy to use. Nice ans sleek design as well. Lightweight. Love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Montre idéale pour un prix correct
reviews.reviewText: Je cherchais une montre connectée simple mais avec de nombreuses fonctionnalités dont la prise d'appels téléphoniques : cela est chose faite.Le design est très joli, le bracelet en plastique est léger et doux au toucher.Le son est également au rendez-vous quand on est en communication.Légère, esthétique, la montre connectée est idéale pour une utilisation de tous les jours!
Elle fonctionne super bien . Très utile bcpfonctions
Me ha sorprendido bastante ya que es lo que esperaba. Cómodo, ligero y fácil de usar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Passt auch für sehr dünne Ärmchen
reviews.reviewText: Die Uhr war ein Weihnachtsgeschenk für die fast 11 jährige Tochter. Ich hatte bedenken über die Größe und wuchtigkeit der Uhr.Bei 13cm Umfang des armes kann die Uhr im hintersten Loch eingestellt werden (wesentlich weniger ist dann nicht mehr möglich. Ist aber normal nicht nötig, da gleichaltrige Kinder einen wesentlich dickeren Umfang haben als 13cm)Wir haben die Uhr heute in Betrieb genommen und das telefonieren funktioniert. Auch Puls und Schritte werden gemessen. Mehr kann ich noch nicht sagen.Design gefällt auch.
